statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 10 \\ -1 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 5 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -6 \\ 0 \\ 4 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
